signed: Signed upper right: L. LOTUS MDXIII

texts.textentryhtml: Private oratory of the Tadini castle, Romano Lombardo, near Bergamo. Crespi Collection; their sale; Achillito Chiesa collection (after Crespi sale); his sale, Part II, New York, April 16, 1926, no. 46. G. Bellesi, London; 1938 purchase by Princeton University Art Museum.
